element.name: Other EMS or Public Safety Agencies at Scene
element.definition: The name(s) of other EMS or Public Safety Agencies at the scene.
element.v3Comment: For states and local agencies that participate in the Cardiac Arrest Registry for Enhanced Survival (CARES), eScene.02 and eScene.03 are used to populate CARES data element #16 Fire/First Responder as defined by CARES in the CARES Data Dictionary: https://mycares.net/sitepages/uploads/DataDictionary.
